snippet: KURTZ--Harold William, passed away on April 15, 2016. He was 82 years old. A lifelong New Yorker, Mr. Kurtz graduated from The Wharton School of Business with an M.B.A. then founded a securities firm, Lombard-Wall, in 1970. The son of Simon Kurtz and Ruth Haberman Kurtz, he was brother to Morton Kurtz, Hariette Asch and Sylvia Herman. He leaves behind two daughters, Kathryn Sarah Kurtz and Susannah Lauren Kurtz, a grandson, Jack Simon FitzPatrick, and wife, Gayle Rodda Kurtz. Donations in his name may be made to Bideawee, 410 E. 38 St., New York, NY 10016. He will be laid to rest at Calverton National Cemetery on Monday, April 18. Services will follow at 3:30pm at the Soldiers', Sailors', Marines', Coast Guard and Airmens' Club at 283 Lexington Avenue in Manhattan. 1/3
